keys.$anErrorOccured: An error occured. Please try again.
keys.$malCleanCustomError:
You are not using classic about.

Please paste this code into a public blog post on the first page so that the code will run automatically.
keys.$animeInfoSetting: Add info to seasonal anime (hover over anime to make it appear)
keys.$showCurrentlyWatchingAnime: Show the anime you are currently watching
keys.$showCurrentlyReadingManga: Show the manga you are currently reading
keys.$addEpisodeCountdown: Add next episode countdown to currently watching anime
keys.$autoAddDates: Automatically add a start/end date to the anime you watch and manga you read
keys.$dynamicBackgroundColor: Add dynamic background color based cover art's color palette
keys.$replaceEditDetails: Replace the edit details with the edit popup
keys.$changeInfoDesign: Change the design of the Information on the left side
keys.$customCoverImage:
Custom Cover Image
(Go to the anime/manga pictures page to change it)
keys.$charDynamicBackground: Add dynamic background color based cover art's color palette
keys.$customCharacterCover:
Custom Cover Image
(Go to the character pictures page to change it)
keys.$hideProfileLeftSide: Hide the modern profile left side if it is not the main profile page
keys.$autoHeaderOpacity: Add auto opacity to the header if the user has a custom banner
keys.$moveBadgesPosition: Move badges after the anime & manga list buttons
keys.$ddEmbedTTL: How often should the Modern Anime/Manga Links data be updated? (Days)
keys.$ddTagTTL: How often should the tag data be updated? (Days)
keys.$ddRelationTTL: How often should the relation data be updated? (Days)
keys.$ddAutoModernLayout: Turn off auto modern layout detection.
keys.$ddAnimeBannerMove: Move the cover image below the banner image.
keys.$activeMcUserStyleWarn: This setting is only for users who do not have Mal Clean Userstyle.
keys.$mcUserStyleModernWarn: Mal Clean Userstyle & Modern Profile Layout Required
keys.$mcUserStyleModernReqWarn: Mal Clean Userstyle & Modern Profile Layout Required.
keys.$customForegroundDesc: Change profile foreground color. This will be visible to users with Mal-Clean-JS.
keys.$customBannerDesc: Add custom banner to your profile. This will be visible to users with Mal-Clean-JS.
keys.$custompfDesc: Add custom avatar to your profile. This will be visible to users with Mal-Clean-JS.
keys.$custombadgeDesc:
Add custom badge to your profile. This will be visible to users with Mal-Clean-JS.

You can use HTML elements. Maximum size 300x150. Update empty to delete.
keys.$malBadgesDesc:
You can add Mal-Badges to your profile. This will be visible to users with Mal-Clean-JS.

If the badge does not appear, it means that the Mal-Badges is blocking access. There is nothing you can do about it.
keys.$customCSSDesc: Add custom css to your profile. This will be visible to users with Mal-Clean-JS.
keys.$customColorsDesc: Change profile colors. This will be visible to users with Mal-Clean-JS.
keys.$privateProfileDesc: You can make your profile private or public for users with Mal-Clean-JS.
keys.$hideProfileElDesc: You can hide your profile elements. This will also apply to users with Mal-Clean-JS.
keys.$customProfileElDesc: You can add custom profile elements your profile. This will be visible to users with Mal-Clean-JS. You can use HTML elements.
keys.$3x3Desc: Click 9 media entries, then save the image below
